title: Petram Scandali, Mundo Universo, Quem Fascinatum Putat, A D. Balthasar Bekkero, Amstelodamensi, Positam Unico Petrino Dicto, I. Petr. V, 8, 9
creator: Teuber, Samuel Christian  Strimesius, Samuel  Strimesius, Johann Samuel
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Teuber, Samuel Christian  Strimesius, Samuel  Strimesius, Johann Samuel: Petram Scandali, Mundo Universo, Quem Fascinatum Putat, A D. Balthasar Bekkero, Amstelodamensi, Positam Unico Petrino Dicto, I. Petr. V, 8, 9  Exegeticè, Elenchticè, Practicè, atq[ue] sic quidem explicato Ut Bekkeriani Operis, Quod Mundum Vocat Fascinatum, Iusta queat dici confutatio, Elidere voluit, Exegeticam partem loco Inauguralis Dissertationis, Sub Moderamine, d. 23. April. A. C. 1706. Elenchticum Pro Praesidio d. 29. April. A. C. Hoc est, ipso Iubilaei Viadrini tempore, publice defendens Samuel Christian Teuber/ SS. Theol. & Phil. D. Pastor & Inspector Metropoleos Neo-Ruppinitanae. Neo-Ruppini  Berlin 1706
